content: PBH S LAM Sharp-point drywall screws Single drywall screw (phosphate-coated) for fastening drywall boards to drywall boards ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Screws- - - ### FEATURES:Features The screws can be driven quickly thanks to their optimized stitch point geometry Low contact pressure – for more comfortable, less tiring screwdriving Hilti has full control of the manufacturing process – delivering reliable, consistent quality The screws match Hilti drivers and bits perfectly for high fastening quality All Hilti drywall stitch-point screws meet or exceed ASTM C 1002 performance requirements Applications Temporary fastening of drywall boards to drywall ### TECHNICAL DATA: Screw head type: Bugle head Screw drive/recess type: PH #2 Collated: No Technical Data | Screw head type | Bugle head | Screw drive/recess type | PH #2 | Collated | No | Environmental Conditions | Dry indoor ### ITEMS- 86205 - Laminating screw 10 x 1-1/2 PBH - Package Size 5000 pc
